lines.text: [in Germany, Clark peers down at a village in the hills and tears come to his eyes]
There it is, kids, my motherland.
Dad, Grandma's from Chicago.
Shut up, Russ.

[watching the romantic couple make out at the table]
Dad he's grabbing her tits right there at the table!
Just eat your breakfast, Russ.

[Rusty still watching the couple]
... Dad, I think he's gonna pork her.
He's not gonna pork her, Russ.
I think he's gonna.
He may pork her, finish your breakfast.

[Clark is driving around Lambeth Bridge Roundabout in London, England, and is unable to turn to the left]
Hey look kids, there's Big Ben, and there's Parliament... again.
Those bells haven't rung in years.
What do they mean?
They're going to hang someone!

[thinks for a moment, then]
DAD!
Who was it that said when in Rome do as the Romans do?
That was Rome not Paris. This is Paris and you're drunk.
[In Germany, Clark is looking for their relatives house]
What are we looking for?
Sechs, Dad.
[Pronounces it as "Sex"]
That'll do Audrey.
Dad, that's German for six.
[From the dinner scene with Helga and Fritz. This line was not Translated and Subtitled]
Isn't that Herman's children?
Herman never had kids.

[Speaking very quickly in a heavy English accent]
You're scuppered mate, this place is full of macaroons, of course I could get on the dog and bone and call my friend down White Chapel way.
[Clark is unable to understand what the Hotel Manager is saying, so he begins using a handheld translation device]
Dad, he's speaking English.
What are the pyramidal tracks?
lines.character: Kent Winkdale, host of 'Pig in a Poke'

lines.text:
[thinking]
... Kent, I believe the pyramidal tracks are housing development outside of Cairo.
Oink oink, my good man!

[after Audrey collapses on a French museums steps]
Great, are you happy now Dad? She's dead!
Do you want something to drink?

[to Ellen]
Honey, you want something?
No thank you.

[to the Stewardess]
I'll have a Coke.
Do you want that in the can?

[Clark turns and looks at the bathroom, then turns back at the Stewardess]
No, I'll have it right here.
[In England]
Clark, you're driving on the wrong side of the road!
I realize that honey. I'm also on the wrong side of the car.
There's Buckingham Palace, kids. That's where the Queen lives and works.
Works? What does she do, Dad?
She queens... and vacuums.

[singing]
Oh the hills are alive with the sound of Griswold/this shit's been around for a very long time./I'm feeling so high, I just can't stand it/It's as if I've been here for at least a week.
Look back there!
Yeah, it's just a hooker. They're all over the place.
Look who she's with!
[Clark looks back, and sees that Rusty is with the hooker]

[comes in the room while Clark is brushing his teeth in a bowl]
... Hey, Dad, look. Bed pans!

[after seeing the large German sausage dish served by Helga]
... God, I miss Jack.

[Audrey is reading Jack's letter]
Dear Audrey, I miss the shit out of you. Luckily, Debbie is been coming by to cheer me up.
That bitch!
Something that matter, Audrey?
No.
[In England, Rusty sees a young man with a punk Mohawk haircut]
That's it! That's it! That's the way I want my haircut, Dad!
Rusty, you don't want to look like a rooster do you?
There's the Left Bank, kids. Russ, I bet you can't guess what bank is on the right.
The Bank of America.
[Rusty and his California Girl join the rest of the family as they chase Ellen's kidnapper]
Get in.
What Happened?
Oh, not much. Mom's been kidnapped.
Clark, why don't we just forget the "Pig-in-a-Poke" itinerary, and just play it by ear, like normal people?
Honey, we're not normal people. We're the Griswolds.
[Repeated line]
God, I miss Jack!

[In their hotel room in England, Ellen opens a door, only to find a closet, and discovering there is no bathroom]
Clark, there's no bathroom.
Of course there's a bathroom. Europeans go to the bathroom, don't they?
[Clark opens the door to his left to find another closet with a mattress inside]
Maybe they don't.

[looking at the Griswolds passports with laughter]
... Typical American assholes.
[last lines]
...Yep, the Griswolds are back.

[dead silence as no-one is answering the final question]
... Clark!
That's it. Clark... of Lewis and Clark. And the Griswold's are our grand prize winners!
lines.character: Kent Winkdale, host of 'Pig in a Poke'

lines.text:
[voice over in letter]
I miss the shit outta you.

[to Clark in French]
Go fuck yourself.
